definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: He showed his concern for his sick mother by his many little attent ions.
sentences.chinese: 他對病中的母親表現了無微不至的關心。

sentences.english: I'm grateful for the special love that you showed in different ways.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你深深愛我無微不至。

sentences.english: Meticulously service and the newest deluxe equipment show out the nobleness.
sentences.chinese: 無微不至管家式服務和最新的豪華設施彰顯尊貴。

sentences.english: But, says Djoko, the care here is “impeccable.”
sentences.chinese: 但Djoko表示，這裏的關愛卻是“無微不至”的。

sentences.english: You to me in life takes good care of me.
sentences.chinese: 您在生活上對我無微不至的關懷我。

sentences.english: He cares about you so much, including the smallest things.
sentences.chinese: 他會注重生活中很多細節，對你做到無微不至的關懷。

sentences.english: She was coddled when she was ill.
sentences.chinese: 她患病時得到了無微不至的照料。

sentences.english: We have no startled day sob ghosts and gods, but meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有驚天泣鬼神，卻有無微不至的關心問候。

sentences.english: His wife is taking good, and thorough care of him.
sentences.chinese: 妻子對他照顧得無微不至，知冷知熱的。

sentences.english: He likes being mothered by his landlady .
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡女房東無微不至地照顧他。

sentences.english: Love is the Woxin meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 愛是無微不至的窩心呵護。

sentences.english: Total care, inside out, from young to old.
sentences.chinese: 從裏到外，從小到老無微不至的關懷。

sentences.english: When I was sick, mother will be mothered by me.
sentences.chinese: 每當我生病時，母親都會無微不至地照顧我。

definition: to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
to be concerned about/to care about
variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
to show concern and care for
to take care/to keep an eye on/to look after/to tell/to remind
